ygData.subject: Finding spells And learning languages
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, just read Shadair s post in the digest I just got, so as far as languages - what he said.  He is RIGHT on the mark with all of that, so just refer back.
ygData.messageBody:
OK, just read Shadair's post in the digest I just got, so as far as
languages - what he said. He is RIGHT on the mark with all of that, so
just refer back.
(BTW, I might just hit you up for some training in that - Do you need
Elder Elvish maybe?)

One thing to note when looking for spells- some are class only - You
wont find enchanters selling Shock of Lightning. But spells like Bind
are used by sooo many people that your particular guild area might not
even carry it - look for either a common seller (like the center
merchants in the Gnome city or others), or check other classes guild
halls. When I wanted Gate, I ended up hitting the Clerics in Felwithe.

Micon
Lev 14 (or 13, depending on if Crush catches me yet again tonight)
Karana
